Welcome

Welcome to Eyup Sukru Ergin's Blog.

I am an Intelligence Analyst, Threat Hunter and Threat Researcher. I specialize in Cyber ​Security and Cyber ​Threat ​Intelligence. I have 3 years of experience in the field of cyber security and I have been constantly improving myself for 5 years. Based on the experience and knowledge I have gained in this process, I make researches and developments and publish them on my blog.
